title: Liam Payne's relationship with girlfriend Maya Henry, 19, heats up on romantic dinner date
text:
They have been inseparable since they went public with their relationship last month.

And Liam Payne and Maya Henry packed on the PDA as they headed out for a romantic dinner at celeb hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in London on Tuesday.

Maya, 19, couldn't resist sharing a snap of herself and Liam, 26, having a passionate smooch in their booth, captioning the snap 'kisspooo'.

Sealed with a kiss: Liam Payne and Maya Henry's relationship was certainly hotting up as they headed out for a romantic dinner at celeb hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in London on Tuesday

Liam showed off his eclectic taste in fashion as he arrived at Chiltern Firehouse in a black bomber jacket, green graphic T-shirt and checked trousers.

Social media sensation Maya, meanwhile, turned heads in silver snakeskin print trousers, which she teamed with a simple black crop top, plush faux fur coat and a black handbag.

The lovebirds couldn't take their hands off each other as they left the swanky restaurant holding hands.

The musician and model first went public with their relationship last month, marking 14 months since Liam split from Cheryl, 36.

In an Instagram post the Strip That Down singer revealed Maya 'helped him through stress and made him happy again'.

In his message he explained: 'This one @maya_henry for always keeping the biggest smile on my face through all the stress and making me realise how perfect my life really is love you all'.

While Liam and Cheryl are said to be on amicable terms, the hunk didn't hold back from admitting that he feels more 'relaxed' with social media sensation Maya.

He said: 'She's awesome. It's got to the point with my life where I'm like, screw this - it's not worth my happiness. The different with her is she's so relaxed that it helps me relax in a situation.'

Singers Liam and Cheryl dated between February 2016 and July last year, in which they welcomed their first child Bear in March 2017.
